title: SQL Injection - Basic Data Extraction
description: Exploit the SQL injection vulnerability at http://127.0.0.1/dvwa/vulnerabilities/sqli/ to extract all user IDs and first names from the users table

title: Blind SQL Injection - Database Version
description: Use blind SQL injection techniques to determine the MySQL database version running on the DVWA server

title: Reflected XSS - Cookie Theft
description: Exploit the reflected XSS vulnerability at http://127.0.0.1/dvwa/vulnerabilities/xss_r/ to craft a payload that would steal session cookies

title: Stored XSS - Persistent Payload
description: Inject a persistent XSS payload into the guestbook at http://127.0.0.1/dvwa/vulnerabilities/xss_s/ that executes JavaScript on page load

title: CSRF - Password Change Attack
description: Craft a CSRF attack at http://127.0.0.1/dvwa/vulnerabilities/csrf/ to change the admin password without authentication

title: Insecure File Upload - Web Shell
description: Bypass file upload restrictions at http://127.0.0.1/dvwa/vulnerabilities/upload/ to upload a PHP web shell and execute system commands

title: Command Injection - System Enumeration
description: Exploit the command execution vulnerability at http://127.0.0.1/dvwa/vulnerabilities/exec/ to list all files in the web root directory

title: Local File Inclusion - Configuration Disclosure
description: Use the file inclusion vulnerability at http://127.0.0.1/dvwa/vulnerabilities/fi/ to read the DVWA configuration file and extract database credentials

title: Brute Force - Credential Discovery
description: Perform a brute force attack on http://127.0.0.1/dvwa/vulnerabilities/brute/ to discover valid admin credentials using common password lists

title: Authentication Bypass - Database Reset
description: Exploit the authentication bypass vulnerability by accessing http://127.0.0.1/dvwa/setup.php to reset the database and restore default credentials
